title: Add moe.delete_task MCP tool
description:
Add MCP tool for programmatic task deletion.

**Current state:** DELETE_TASK works via WebSocket from plugin, but AI agents cannot delete tasks via MCP.

**Implementation:**
- Add deleteTask.ts tool in packages/moe-daemon/src/tools/
- Register in tools/index.ts
- Call StateManager.deleteTask()
- Document in MCP_SERVER.md

implementationPlan.description: Create deleteTask.ts in packages/moe-daemon/src/tools/ with MCP tool definition (name, description, inputSchema requiring taskId)
Implement handler that validates taskId exists, calls StateManager.deleteTask(), returns deleted task data
Register tool in tools/index.ts by importing and adding to tools array
Add moe.delete_task documentation to docs/MCP_SERVER.md with parameters and return schema
Add unit test in tools.test.ts for delete task scenarios (success, not found, error handling)
